resources.string: Thank you for your use.\nIf you like this app, I\'d appreciate it if you donate to me.
There is no provision of additional functionality by that you donate.
If you want to put your name on app, send me a mail with your order-ID and your nickname.
If you want to donate the other ways, please send me a mail.
If you don\'t install this app from Google Play, you can\'t donate on this app via Google Play.
